items.question: How does EasyPub ensure WeChat compatibility?
items.answer: We generate strict inline styles and adapt for common mobile layouts to avoid style loss after pasting.

items.question: Can I paste from Word/Notion/Markdown?
items.answer: Yes. We clean messy pasted code and preserve image anchors and structure.

items.question: Can I customize the visual style?
items.answer: Choose from 9 curated styles and fine-tune headings, quotes, and lists.

items.question: Can I still edit after generation?
items.answer: Absolutely. EasyPub outputs standard HTML you can tweak before pasting.

items.question: How are images handled?
items.answer: We auto-compress images and keep them WeChat-safe for stable rendering.

items.question: What languages are supported?
items.answer: English and Chinese UIs are available.
